content:
# The stone furnace has been successfully crafted and added to my inventory. This is a significant step forward as it allows me to smelt the copper ore into copper plates.

# Now, I will place the stone furnace in my current position and then proceed to smelt the copper ore.
furnace_position = get_position()  # Get the current position to place the furnace.
place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, position=furnace_position)  # Place the stone furnace at the current position.
